subject: p16043637
History: -year-old woman with asthma and cough x3 weeks. Question pneumonia.
Findings: The patient is status post median sternotomy as well as pacemaker placement with leads terminating in right atrium and ventricle. There is also a aortic valve prosthesis. The heart size remains normal. There are no focal opacities concerning for an infectious process. No pleural effusion and no pneumothorax.
Impression: No evidence of acute intrathoracic process.
